title: Crypto Bountyes
author: Crypto Bountyes
created_time: March 13, 2023, 02:18:46 PMLast edit: June 10, 2023, 12:49:06 PM by Crypto Bountyes
content: First we work, then you pay.My name is Daniel. I have been involved in crypto since 2019. I have been in the Crypto Bitcoin forum for a long time. I am a professional bouti campaign manager. I have preached many cryptocurrency projects before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Ask me if you have any information.Our service- CEO Baunty Management- Social Media Marketing- Forum Posting- Writing blogs- YouTube video making service.- Telegram Group Management- Twitter followers grow

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Bountyes on March 13, 2023, 02:18:46 PMFirst we work, then you pay.My name is Daniel. I have been involved in crypto since 2019. I have been in the Crypto Bitcoin forum for a long time. I am a professional bouti campaign manager. I have preached many cryptocurrency projects before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Ask me if you have any information.I'm glad for you, but there's really no need to spam and open several topics where you offer the same thing.here you opened a topic where you offer bounty management, you also do things that are against the rules of the forum, such as an unwanted bump within 24 hours.by spamming here, you won't get good publicity. also, it is necessary to wait for a rank upgrade or to buy a copper membership so that the pictures you upload are visible.

comments.author: Crypto Bountyes
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on March 13, 2023, 02:38:30 PMQuote from: Crypto Bountyes on March 13, 2023, 02:18:46 PMFirst we work, then you pay.My name is Daniel. I have been involved in crypto since 2019. I have been in the Crypto Bitcoin forum for a long time. I am a professional bouti campaign manager. I have preached many cryptocurrency projects before. According to everyone, my medium of promotion is different, but everyone likes it. Ask me if you have any information.I'm glad for you, but there's really no need to spam and open several topics where you offer the same thing.here you opened a topic where you offer bounty management, you also do things that are against the rules of the forum, such as an unwanted bump within 24 hours.by spamming here, you won't get good publicity. also, it is necessary to wait for a rank upgrade or to buy a copper membership so that the pictures you upload are visible.My activity is not increasing. I can't see the pictures of that project. I had 28 activity in 1 day. I thought maybe 30 activity will be done the next day but my activity has not increased. so i am sorry.

comments.author: Crypto_Dotar
comments.body: Have you preached the bow before?

comments.author: Crypto Bountyes
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto_Dotar on March 13, 2023, 10:17:14 PMHave you preached the bow before?Yes, I have preached a lot before. And I've worked with another manager for a long time. I can do everything. For example: grafix design, spreadsheet check, bounty thread, Airdop promote etc. Ask me if you have any questions.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Bountyes on March 13, 2023, 03:01:48 PMMy activity is not increasing. I can't see the pictures of that project. I had 28 activity in 1 day. I thought maybe 30 activity will be done the next day but my activity has not increased. so i am sorry.you can't pump up your account in just a few days. spamming and posting 30 posts a day will certainly not help, you are much closer to getting a spam badge. the maximum you can get in one day is 1 activity point in bi-weekly periods. therefore, 14 days are needed for the progress of 14 activities. You can learn more in this thread:FAQ: Everything you need to know about forum 'activity, account ranks and merityou should also read and understand the basic rules of the forum. Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQyou may have noticed that some of your posts have been deleted, I'll tell you the reason why this happened.Quote from: mprep on July 21, 2014, 05:27:51 PM13. Bumps, "updates" are limited to once per 24 hours per thread. Bumping multiple threads at the same time is allowed if it's not annoying. [2][e]
